long_desc.thetext: This is the result of the second, manual proofreading pass of the documentation. Patch is attached.

Created attachment 86325 Patch against the workspace
This patch includes all changes of the "documentation" project, as well as a related minor change in "core.expressions"

This bug has been moved to www.openArchitectureWare.org/bugzilla. It has been reopened in a batch process and will be closed again in a few minutes.
Yes, this sounds strange but seems to be the only way to be conform with the bugzilla workflow.

This bug has been moved to www.openArchitectureWare.org/bugzilla. This action is part of a batch process. We apologize if you received many mails due to this action. After change of the resolution the bugs will be closed.
